front.title: IANA Considerations for Network Layer Protocol Identifiers

abstract.t: Some protocols being developed or extended by the IETF make use of the ISO/IEC (International Organization for Standardization / International Electrotechnical Commission) Network Layer Protocol Identifier (NLPID). This document provides NLPID IANA Considerations. D. Eastlake [page 1] INTERNET-DRAFT IANA Considerations for NLPIDs
